mapper.select: with recursive t as ( select *, name as fullname from sys_department where id = #{id} union all select c.*, concat(t.fullname, ' > ', c.name) as fullname from sys_department c, t where c.pid = t.id ) select * from t;

with recursive t as ( select *, name as fullname from sys_department where id = #{id} union all select c.*, concat(c.name, ' > ', t.fullname) as fullname from sys_department c, t where c.id = t.pid ) select * from t;
mapper.insert: insert into sys_department (pid, name, status) VALUES (#{pid}, #{name}, #{status});
